  3. City Council

Current Members The current members of the City Council are:

  • Ward Roddam , Mayor - At-Large (5/2028)
  • Daniel Willie , Council Member - West (5/2028)
  • Lin Perry , Mayor Pro-Tem, Council Member - West Â (5/2026)
  • Esme Ruelas-Olivares , Council Member - East (5/28)
  • Dave Melton , Council Member - East (5/2026)
  • Brad Caffey , Council Member - West (5/2027)
  • Scott Starnes , Council Member - East (5/2027)

Election and Appointment The City Charter (PDF) provides for a City Council consisting of a mayor and six members. The mayor is elected at large, while three council members are elected each from the east and west wards. The City Council elects a mayor pro-tem to perform the duties of the mayor in the absence or disability of the mayor. The council also appoints members of the various city boards, committees and commissions .

Requirements The mayor and council members serve three-year terms and must be:

  • 21 years old
  • Living in the district they represent
  • Residents of the city for at least 12 months prior to the election
  1. Lin Perry, Mayor Pro-Tem
  2. Brad Caffey, Council Member
  3. Esme Ruelas-Olivares, Council Member
  4. Scott Starnes, Council Member
  5. Dave Melton, Council Member
  6. Ward Roddam, Mayor, Interim
  7. Daniel Willie, Council Member
